name: A LOT OF OVERWEIGHT
description:
Made for Quarantine Jam

The theme was A lot of ...

You play as a boy who has a lot of overweight!

You want to  eat all of the hamburgers in the school, but there a few kids that want to humiliate you.  Cover your ears when they do that, otherwise you will be depressed.

But not all of them are mean! Some of them are nice and hearing what they say will make you happier!

Will you survive to taste all of the hamburgers?

P.S. : The song is FAT by "Weird Al" Yankovic!
